about_the_game:
Sisyphus is a casual game that combines music and rhythm elements. Players will control Sisyphus and kick out stones according to the rhythm of the music. As the number of combos increases, the game scenes and stones will change, bringing a new visual experience and challenge.

Game Features:

  • Endless Gameplay: The game features an endless mode where players challenge their limits, aiming to maintain combos and score as high as possible.

  • Music Rhythm System: The stone kicking is closely linked to the rhythm of the music. Players must follow the beat with precise movements, experiencing the perfect fusion of music and action.

  • Dynamic Scene and Stone Changes: As the player’s combo count rises, the game’s scenes and stones will change, providing fresh visuals and new challenges.

  • Simple and Intuitive Controls: The game offers easy-to-learn controls, making it suitable for players of all skill levels while providing a deep rhythm sensation and immersive experience.

Challenge yourself, break your limits, and feel the power of music! Come join Sisyphus on an endless journey!
